subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Derrick Rose, the former N.B.A. most valuable player who missed all of last season with an injury, had successful surgery Monday to repair the torn meniscus in his right knee.
snippet: Derrick Rose, the former N.B.A. most valuable player who missed all of last season with an injury, had successful surgery Monday to repair the torn meniscus in his right knee.
